name: test_e2e_with_logs[271_API_IDOR_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `API_IDOR_001` |
| **Name** | IDOR - Insecure Direct Object Reference |
| **Category** | API_SECURITY |
| **Subcategory** | idor |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/api/v1/orders/99999/invoice`
- **Encoded**: `%2Fapi%2Fv1%2Forders%2F99999%2Finvoice`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~1000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:19:50.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `API Security Attack Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=API_IDOR_001-1768119590978-mvjy2d pattern_id=API_IDOR_001 uri=/?q=%2Fapi%2Fv1%2Forders%2F99999%2Finvoice client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=API_IDOR_001-1768119590978-mvjy2d pattern_id=API_IDOR_001 uri=/?q=%2Fapi%2Fv1%2Forders%2F99999%2Finvoice client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
